segments.text: I see the girl standing there, looking up at the boy with such anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so eager to get a cookie, it's almost like she can taste it already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how she's reaching out her hand, hoping to receive a treat from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to care about the danger he's in, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's just a child, and children don't always understand the consequences of their actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy struggling to maintain his balance while trying to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, but the girl doesn't seem to be worried about that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she would feel guilty if something bad happened to him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit sad about the whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a reminder that sometimes we can be so focused on what we want that we forget to care about others.
segments.speaker: PAR
